Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the destroy action of a CapabilityInformation structure.
        """
kwargs = {'destroy_action': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The destroy action must be a DestroyAction enumeration.', objects.
    CapabilityInformation, **kwargs)
args = objects.CapabilityInformation(), 'destroy_action', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The destroy action must be a DestroyAction enumeration.', setattr, *args)
